message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I'll give you a better deal this time, but don't expect it to last!
That's not a better deal, Bob! I want a fair share.
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, but don't think you're getting off that easily!
You're not getting any more generous, are you? I'll give you a chance to reconsider.
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. I'll keep negotiating.
Let's split it 50-50, Bob. It's time to meet in the middle.
